name: Diablo III: Ultimate Evil Edition
description:
Diablo III: Ultimate Evil Edition is an action-RPG game. It came out on 19-08-2014. Blizzard Entertainment published the game. Diablo III: Ultimate Evil Edition has a Metascore of 88, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Diablo III: Ultimate Evil Edition on PlayStation 3, Xbox One, PC and Xbox 360.
Derek Duke, Glenn Stafford and Russell Brower scored the game.
